text: Clypeosectus delectus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lepetodrilidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species is found in the Pacific Ocean at thermal vents, Galapagos Rift ==References== * Warén, A. & Bouchet, P. (2001) Gastropoda and Monoplacophora from hydrothermal vents and seeps; new taxa and records. The Veliger, 44, 116–231 ==External links== * Category:Lepetodrilidae Category:Gastropods described in 1989
title: Clypeosectus delectus
